p: Table 2 shows that there is a significant (P < 0.05) decrease in the total body weight gained and brain weights of the rats treated with nitrobenzene alone. The decrease in growth rate of the experimental animals ( Fig. 1) also corroborates the observed decline in the total body weight gained and protein content ( Fig. 11) of the rats administered with nitrobenzene only. Treatment of the rats with either MLVA or Vitamin E reverse these decrease and enhance the ratsâ€™ growth beyond those in the control group.
